title: eSTu hELidaru
sahitya:
eStu hELidaru ninage matiyu tiLiyadu


anupallavi

  dhulavaDi nina mOre mEle dhudiyu kaNadu


caraNam 1    dEha tannadendu higguva dEhasankaTa bAradu 
gEhakke gEha kUDi hOdhare hALu manakke guriyAdyO lavaDi
    caraNam 2    heNDadi tannavaLendu higguva heNDadi sankaTa bAraLu 
heNDadi mundake sgi hOdhare laNDatanake guriyAdyO lavaDi
    caraNam 3    dEha tannadendu higguva dEha sankaTa bAradu 
gEhakke gEha kUDi hOdhare purandara viTTalana maretyO lavaDi
